system.description: When you @UUID[Compendium.urban-shadows-pbta.play-materials.Item.QA5lS7xT1yU4zV0w]{hit the streets} to get what you need from a member of your Circle, roll with HEART instead of their Circle.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: The MC tells you what interesting thing happens.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, they're available and have the stuff.

On a 7-9, choose 1:

  • whoever you're going to is juggling their own problems
  • whatever you need is more costly than anticipated
  • however you find them requires you to offer a Debt to an intermediary

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value: On a hit, they're available and have the stuff.
